Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clinton
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clinton due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clinton due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains bypassing Clinton
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clinton due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clinton due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
